Kim Jong Il sends wreath to bier of Kang Sok Sung
    Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- leader kim jong il today sent a wreath to the bier of the late Kang Sok Sung, member of the Central Committee of the WPK, deputy to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and director of the History Institute of the C.C., the WPK,  expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.content:
Greetings to President of Commonwealth of Dominica
    Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Vernon Shaw, President of the Commonwealth of Dominica, on May 10 on his 71st birthday.
 Warmly congratulating the president on his birthday the message sincerely wished him a greater success in his noble work for the progress and the prosperity of the country.
